meanings.definition: A device operated by foot to control machinery or equipment.
meanings.sent1: The treddles on the sewing machine help control the speed of the needle.
meanings.sent2: She pressed the treddles of the loom gently to weave the fabric.
meanings.sent3: The treddles on the old piano made it seem like a magical instrument.
meanings.sent4: His feet moved the treddles of the bicycle smoothly, propelling him forward.
meanings.sent5: The treddles of the spinning wheel spun yarn with each step.

meanings.definition: The act of stepping or treading.
meanings.sent1: Her treddles on the crunchy leaves echoed through the quiet forest.
meanings.sent2: The treddles of the dancers created a rhythmic sound on the wooden floor.
meanings.sent3: The treddles of the cat on the keyboard resulted in a funny melody.
meanings.sent4: His treddles on the path left imprints in the soft mud.
meanings.sent5: The treddles of the hiker were the only sound in the serene valley.
